## ErrorBoundaryAlertProps interface

Props for the ErrorBoundaryAlert component

<b>Signature</b>

```typescript
export interface ErrorBoundaryAlertProps 
```
<b>Import</b>

```typescript
import { ErrorBoundaryAlertProps } from '@grafana/ui';
```
<b>Properties</b>

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [children](#children-property) | <code>ReactNode</code> | Component to be wrapped with an error boundary |
|  [dependencies](#dependencies-property) | <code>any[]</code> | Will re-render children after error if recover values changes |
|  [style](#style-property) | <code>'page' &#124; 'alertbox'</code> | 'page' will render full page error with stacktrace. 'alertbox' will render an <Alert />. Default 'alertbox' |
|  [title](#title-property) | <code>string</code> | Title for the error boundary alert |

### children property

Component to be wrapped with an error boundary

<b>Signature</b>

```typescript
children: ReactNode;
```

### dependencies property

Will re-render children after error if recover values changes

<b>Signature</b>

```typescript
dependencies?: any[];
```

### style property

'page' will render full page error with stacktrace. 'alertbox' will render an <Alert />. Default 'alertbox'

<b>Signature</b>

```typescript
style?: 'page' | 'alertbox';
```

### title property

Title for the error boundary alert

<b>Signature</b>

```typescript
title?: string;
```
